communicationTable.description: The item communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it.
The item speaks one or more languages.
The item speaks one or more languages. In addition, the item can communicate telepathically with any creature that carries or wields it.

sensesTable.senses: Hearing and standard vision out to 30 feet
Hearing and standard vision out to 60 feet
Hearing and standard vision out to 120 feet
Hearing and Darkvision out to 120 feet

specialPurposes.name: Aligned
specialPurposes.description: The item seeks to defeat or destroy those of a diametrically opposed alignment. Such an item is never Neutral.

specialPurposes.name: Bane
specialPurposes.description: The item seeks to thwart or destroy creatures of a particular type, such as Constructs, Fiends, or Undead.

specialPurposes.name: Creator Seeker
specialPurposes.description: The item seeks its creator and wants to understand why it was created.

specialPurposes.name: Destiny Seeker
specialPurposes.description: The item believes it and its bearer have key roles to play in future events.

specialPurposes.name: Destroyer
specialPurposes.description: The item craves destruction and goads its user to fight arbitrarily.

specialPurposes.name: Glory Seeker
specialPurposes.description: The item seeks renown as the greatest magic item in the world by winning fame or notoriety for its user.

specialPurposes.name: Lore Seeker
specialPurposes.description: The item craves knowledge or is determined to solve a mystery, learn a secret, or unravel a cryptic prophecy.

specialPurposes.name: Protector
specialPurposes.description: The item seeks to defend a particular kind of creature, such as elves or werewolves.

specialPurposes.name: Soulmate Seeker
specialPurposes.description: The item seeks another sentient magic item, perhaps one that is similar to itself.

specialPurposes.name: Templar
specialPurposes.description: The item seeks to defend the servants and interests of a particular deity.

conflictDemands.name: Chase My Dreams
conflictDemands.description: The item demands that its bearer pursue the item's goals to the exclusion of all other goals.

conflictDemands.name: Get Rid of It
conflictDemands.description: The item demands that its bearer dispose of anything the item finds repugnant.

conflictDemands.name: It's Time for a Change
conflictDemands.description: The item demands to be given to someone else.

conflictDemands.name: Keep Me Close
conflictDemands.description: The item insists on being carried or worn at all times.
